description: This API modifies the attributes of a serverless cache.

parameters.name: ServerlessCacheName
parameters.description: User-provided identifier for the serverless cache to be modified.

parameters.name: CacheUsageLimits
parameters.description: Modify the cache usage limit for the serverless cache. DataStorage (dict) --- The maximum data storage limit in the cache, expressed in Gigabytes. Maximum (integer) --- The upper limit for data storage the cache is set to use. Minimum (integer) --- The lower limit for data storage the cache is set to use. The unit that the storage is measured in, in GB. ECPUPerSecond (dict) --- The configuration for the number of ElastiCache Processing Units (ECPU) the cache can consume per second. Maximum (integer) --- The configuration for the maximum number of ECPUs the cache can consume per second. Minimum (integer) --- The configuration for the minimum number of ECPUs the cache should be able consume per second.

nested_params.name: DataStorage
nested_params.description: The maximum data storage limit in the cache, expressed in Gigabytes.

nested_params.name: Maximum
nested_params.description: The upper limit for data storage the cache is set to use.

nested_params.name: Minimum
nested_params.description: The lower limit for data storage the cache is set to use.

nested_params.name: Unit
nested_params.description: The unit that the storage is measured in, in GB.

nested_params.name: ECPUPerSecond
nested_params.description: The configuration for the number of ElastiCache Processing Units (ECPU) the cache can consume per second.

nested_params.name: Maximum
nested_params.description: The configuration for the maximum number of ECPUs the cache can consume per second.

nested_params.name: Minimum
nested_params.description: The configuration for the minimum number of ECPUs the cache should be able consume per second.

parameters.name: SecurityGroupIds
parameters.description: The new list of VPC security groups to be associated with the serverless cache. Populating this list means the current VPC security groups will be removed. This security group is used to authorize traffic access for the VPC end-point (private-link). Default = NULL - the existing list of VPC security groups is not removed. (string) ---

nested_items.name: ServerlessCache
nested_items.description: The response for the attempt to modify the serverless cache.

nested_items.name: ServerlessCacheName
nested_items.description: The unique identifier of the serverless cache.

nested_items.name: Description
nested_items.description: A description of the serverless cache.

nested_items.name: CreateTime
nested_items.description: When the serverless cache was created.

nested_items.name: Status
nested_items.description: The current status of the serverless cache. The allowed values are CREATING, AVAILABLE, DELETING, CREATE-FAILED and MODIFYING.

nested_items.name: Engine
nested_items.description: The engine the serverless cache is compatible with.

nested_items.name: MajorEngineVersion
nested_items.description: The version number of the engine the serverless cache is compatible with.

nested_items.name: FullEngineVersion
nested_items.description: The name and version number of the engine the serverless cache is compatible with.

nested_items.name: CacheUsageLimits
nested_items.description: The cache usage limit for the serverless cache.

nested_items.name: DataStorage
nested_items.description: The maximum data storage limit in the cache, expressed in Gigabytes.

nested_items.name: Maximum
nested_items.description: The upper limit for data storage the cache is set to use.

nested_items.name: Minimum
nested_items.description: The lower limit for data storage the cache is set to use.

nested_items.name: Unit
nested_items.description: The unit that the storage is measured in, in GB.

nested_items.name: ECPUPerSecond
nested_items.description: The configuration for the number of ElastiCache Processing Units (ECPU) the cache can consume per second.

nested_items.name: Maximum
nested_items.description: The configuration for the maximum number of ECPUs the cache can consume per second.

nested_items.name: Minimum
nested_items.description: The configuration for the minimum number of ECPUs the cache should be able consume per second.

nested_items.name: KmsKeyId
nested_items.description: The ID of the Amazon Web Services Key Management Service (KMS) key that is used to encrypt data at rest in the serverless cache.

nested_items.name: SecurityGroupIds
nested_items.description: The IDs of the EC2 security groups associated with the serverless cache.
(string) ---

nested_items.name: Address
nested_items.description: The DNS hostname of the cache node.

nested_items.name: Port
nested_items.description: The port number that the cache engine is listening on.

nested_items.name: ReaderEndpoint
nested_items.description: Represents the information required for client programs to connect to a cache node. This value is read-only.

nested_items.name: Address
nested_items.description: The DNS hostname of the cache node.

nested_items.name: Port
nested_items.description: The port number that the cache engine is listening on.

nested_items.name: ARN
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the serverless cache.

nested_items.name: UserGroupId
nested_items.description: The identifier of the user group associated with the serverless cache. Available for Valkey and Redis OSS only. Default is NULL.

nested_items.name: SubnetIds
nested_items.description: If no subnet IDs are given and your VPC is in us-west-1, then ElastiCache will select 2 default subnets across AZs in your VPC. For all other Regions, if no subnet IDs are given then ElastiCache will select 3 default subnets across AZs in your default VPC.
(string) ---

nested_items.name: SnapshotRetentionLimit
nested_items.description: The current setting for the number of serverless cache snapshots the system will retain. Available for Valkey, Redis OSS and Serverless Memcached only.

nested_items.name: DailySnapshotTime
nested_items.description: The daily time that a cache snapshot will be created. Default is NULL, i.e. snapshots will not be created at a specific time on a daily basis. Available for Valkey, Redis OSS and Serverless Memcached only.
